title: Getting Dced after game and during que
body: Hi, I have encountered a problem for the past month where I would get dced from the after game screen and during ques even through I dont lose connection at all during the game itself

replies.body: actually after doing these steps I get dced way less than before but I still lose connection sometimes

Just so I'm getting this straight, you *only* get disconnected in the after game lobby and not during the game itself? Straaaange....

Let's go ahead and run over some of your network settings to make sure everything is still in order there. Sometimes adjusting your port forward settings or setting up your DNS manually can give you a much stronger connection. Give those two steps a go using this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but let me know if this keeps happening and I can dig a little deeper!
Tried the following tips but I still get disconnected
I only get dced when waiting for stats and such so I cant report people, also I get dced during que so I cant accept que some times
